response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $10,000. Considering this, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This opportunity is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible value while also securing a competitive advantage in your field. I look forward to discussing how this product can transform your business or life. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 15000}
